title: Cozy Autumn Breeze

diffuser.notes: Adjust to your liking; a sweeter blend, add more Orange.

why_it_works: Invigorate your senses with the warm, spicy scent of Cinnamon and the uplifting aroma of Orange, while Frankincense adds a soothing, earthy depth.
safety: Avoid eyes/mucosa; keep from children & pets.
Consult a professional if pregnant, nursing, or under care.
tags: Use:Diffuse during a cozy evening or apply topically after a shower.
